div.br:
BOE APRIL 16, 2020 WORK SESSION AGENDA
April 16, 2020 Work Session Agenda (6).pdf
CCSD Remote BOE Meeting Protocols
● There are estimated times for each agenda item to facilitate the conversation & guests who may be joining the meeting.
● Those wishing to speak during public comment should contact Lisa Stamm prior to the start of each meeting via Lisa.Stamm@ccsdre1.org. Additionally, questions or comments may be submitted prior to the meeting and will be read during the public comment portion.
● Please do not use the chat feature.
● Mute your microphone unless you are speaking.
● State your name prior to speaking.
● Indicate when you are finished speaking (ex "end of comment")
Carlson FAQ's, 2.14.20.pdf
Carlson FAQ's, 2.14.20.pdf
Carlson Family Mtg.pdf

div.h2: Welcome to Clear Creek School District

div.p: Welcome to Clear Creek School District! Our mission is to provide quality well-rounded education to students in Evergreen, Idaho Springs, Empire, and Georgetown. Our dedicated staff is committed to upholding the values to inspire, challenge, and empower young minds to excel academically and socially. While offering rigorous academic curriculum in all grade levels, Clear Creek School District aspires to offer an education that moves beyond traditional academic learning. Academic opportunities at Clear Creek are enhanced by creative arts, vocation, physical, social, and emotional learning. We understand that all of these elements are necessary to inspire our young people to become fearless lifelong learners and to excel in higher education and life.

p.br:
Revisions are being considered for the following Policy:
BEAA Electronic Participation in School Board Meetings
Please submit comments to Lisa.Stamm@ccsdre1.org by Friday April 24, 2020 4:00 pm
